examples.text: he was carefully honing the curved blade

definitions: refine or perfect (something) over a period of time

examples.text: some of the best players in the world honed their skills playing street football

definitions: give greater strength or firmness to (the body or a part of the body)

examples.text: she has been working hard to hone her physique
the detectives honed in on the suspect
I started to hone in on the problem

definitions: a whetstone, especially one used to sharpen razors.
